name: TDengine Sink
shortDescription: Consume data from a Kafka topic in Quix and persist the data to an TDengine database.

Variables.Name: TDENGINE_HOST
Variables.Description: Host address for the TDengine instance.

Variables.Name: TDENGINE_TOKEN
Variables.Description: Authentication token to access TDengine. Either this or a username + password must be used.

Variables.Name: TDENGINE_SUPERTABLE
Variables.Description: The TDengine supertable name; required when a custom callable is not defined in the code.

Variables.Name: TDENGINE_TAGS_KEYS
Variables.Description: The tags to include when writing the measurement data. Example: Tag1,Tag2

Variables.Name: TDENGINE_FIELDS_KEYS
Variables.Description: The fields to include when writing the measurement data. Example: Field1,Field2

Variables.Name: TIMESTAMP_COLUMN
Variables.Description: A key to be used as 'time' when converting to InfluxDB line protocol, else uses Kafka timestamp. May require adjusting `TDENGINE_TIME_PRECISION` to match.

Variables.Name: TDENGINE_TIME_PRECISION
Variables.Description: time precision assumed when converting to InfluxDB line protocol. Possible values: 'ms', 'ns', 'us', 's'.

Variables.Name: TDENGINE_NAME_SUBTABLES_FROM_TAGS
Variables.Description: If `true`, name subtables using the tag values (joined on `__`), else use TDengine's auto-generated randomized values.

Variables.Name: TDENGINE_ALLOW_MISSING_FIELDS
Variables.Description: if `true`, skip the missing fields keys, else raise `KeyError`

Variables.Name: TDENGINE_INCLUDE_METADATA_TAGS
Variables.Description: if `true`, includes record's key, topic, and partition as tags.

Variables.Name: TDENGINE_CONVERT_INTS_TO_FLOATS
Variables.Description: if `true`, converts all integer values to floats.

Variables.Name: TDENGINE_ENABLE_GZIP
Variables.Description: if `true`, enables gzip compression for writes.

Variables.Name: TDENGINE_MAX_RETRIES
Variables.Description: Maximum number of retries for failed requests

Variables.Name: TDENGINE_RETRY_BACKOFF_FACTOR
Variables.Description: A {factor * 2^(retry_count)} backoff factor per retry attempt, starting from the second

Variables.Name: CONSUMER_GROUP_NAME
Variables.Description: The name of the consumer group to use when consuming from Kafka

Variables.Name: BUFFER_SIZE
Variables.Description: The number of records that sink holds before flush data to TDengine

Variables.Name: BUFFER_TIMEOUT
Variables.Description: The number of seconds that sink holds before flush data to TDengine
